Class oracle.html.Anchor

Class oracle.html.Anchor 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Item
           |
           +----oracle.html.Anchor
public class Anchor
extends Item
Description:

Anchor Class encapsulates an Anchor object Note:
This constitutes the Anchor part of ANCHOR element as specified in HTML2

Instructions:

Use this class whenver you want to create a link target. Use Link objects to create hyperlinks that point to this target.

Example: 

// Creates an anchor
Anchor anchor = new Anchor("expire_date", new SimpleItem("Expire Date: 02/96"));

See Also:
Item, Link

Anchor(String, IHtmlItem)
Creates a Anchor Object

Creates a Anchor Object

Returns content of this object as HTML String

Returns content of this object as regular string

Anchor 
  public Anchor(String name,
                IHtmlItem item)
Creates a Anchor Object
Parameters:
name - The name of this anchor (becomes a link target)
item - The item to be hyperanchored

                String text)
Creates a Anchor Object
Parameters:
name - The name of this anchor (becomes a link target)
text - The text to be hyperanchored
